title: Shore
creator_credit: Greg Reading, John Shaw, Don Murray and Film Australia
brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “The Little world of Dietmar Fill”.
Where the sea meets the land we find a place of harsh extremes and constant change. Dietmar, Bibi and marine biologist Elizabeth Pope, explore the rich and varied life of the rocky seashore. Narrated by Robyn Williams.
creator_credit_for_label: Greg Reading, John Shaw, Don Murray and Film Australia
